response.overview: Kids get praise for doing anything remotely well. But if I told you I tied my own shoelaces this morning, you’d just give me a worried look. Claire Hooper is done with being an adult - pretending to have fun at ten pin bowling, pretending to enjoy her children’s concert performances, pretending she’s not desperate for her father’s love. And she’s written a whole show just to get her dad to tell her that he’s SO PROUD. Seen on Have You Been Paying Attention? and host of podcast I’m The Worst with Claire Hooper.
response.title: Claire Hooper - So Proud
